name: ez_message
description: Team project by Steve, Diya, Paula, Adrian, Mariela

scripts.install-dep: concurrently "cd server-socket && npm install" "cd client-socket && npm install" "npm install"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server-socket && npm start" "cd client-socket && npm start" "nodemon index.js"
